_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
notes: SPY long put, 580 strike, Apr expiry
rationale: Bearish directional bet on SPY pullback

entry_conditions.notes: For CSP (cash-secured put): sell when IV rank elevated, bullish or neutral bias. For long options: buy when IV is low, strong directional conviction.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Premium received (short) or unlimited (long call) / strike - premium (long put)
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Strike price - premium (short put) or premium paid (long)
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Theta decay (short side profits), IV change

greeks_profile.theta: positive if short, negative if long
greeks_profile.vega: negative if short (profits from IV crush), positive if long
greeks_profile.delta: directional â€” positive for calls, negative for puts
greeks_profile.gamma: negative if short (acceleration risk), positive if long

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Short put: stock stays above strike, collect full premium. Long put: sharp decline.
